reviews.title: One star, I couldn‚Äôt write
reviews.name: One star, I couldn‚Äôt write
reviews.text: When I tried to give this app a one star review it wouldn‚Äôt let me type out a response for a while so I gave it a two star review. Now all of a sudden my text matters. That should tell you how terrible this game is because you can‚Äôt even give it a one star review and actually voicing your opinion. Truth is this game is not free, this game gives you the bare minimum to tease you to  hate your money and spend it. So burn it here.

reviews.title: Game crashes constantly - STILL!
reviews.name: Game crashes constantly - STILL!
reviews.text: Update: Downgrading one star because of the crashing issue which happens now only when I‚Äôm about to win a hard level. Boosts and lives are lost. I won‚Äôt go so far as to call it a scam - yet. Super fun game but it crashes all the time, usually when I‚Äôm about to win a hard level. Players in the community help forum are complaining of the same thing and say they‚Äôve been waiting for weeks for a response from developers. Not cool.

reviews.title: Ads that I can't leave
reviews.name: Ads that I can't leave
reviews.text: Great game, super fun. I don't mind the ads because it means I can play for free.  But, there are some ads that don't let you go back to the game. So I gave to close the game and get back in. First world problem, I know, but annoying.Specifically, the Amazon ads freeze and an ad about Seattle does nothing and shows nothing.Thank you for the game!

reviews.title: Candy Crush Leaderboards
reviews.name: Candy Crush Leaderboards
reviews.text: Will you bring back the leaderboards? I can‚Äôt see how many games I‚Äôve won for the week.

reviews.title: App quits
reviews.name: App quits
reviews.text: I‚Äôve bought coins only to have app quit in the middle of a game and I lose everything as a result. Done with this. There is a bug in your app.

reviews.title: Robbery
reviews.name: Robbery
reviews.text: I‚Äôm not very happy. I was robbed of almost all of my gold bars in exchange for 5 hours of unlimited lives. Deceiving ad that looks just like others except this one takes your gold bars. I don‚Äôt even know how it happened I‚Äôve  had to keep looking for that ad to see what happened. I had close to 100 gold bars. Was left with nine. All of those hours of free play were during the night. I want my gold bars back. Get rid of that ad please.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.name: Meh
reviews.text: Blatantly unfair in hopes you‚Äôll spend money on boosts since most of the levels are impossible with out them. You have to be extremely lucky a lot and redo levels over and over if you don‚Äôt want to pay

reviews.title: Bad changes in new update
reviews.name: Bad changes in new update
reviews.text: I‚Äôve been playing this game for years, have long surpassed 10K levels. This most recent update included a change that makes it so I can no longer see how many boosters I have - it only says ‚Äú99+‚Äù. I choose to use my boosters based on how many I have (who doesn‚Äôt?). I will be way less inclined to continue playing.

reviews.title: Spending money once ensures no fun
reviews.name: Spending money once ensures no fun
reviews.text: I purchased a nice package over the holiday break for fun and by doing so have looped myself into nothing but manipulation fromlack of moves available and further encouragements to separate me from my money, which I will never do again.  What a unfortunate sham for an otherwise awesome game.

reviews.title: So dumb
reviews.name: So dumb
reviews.text: My game ALWAYS crashes when I‚Äôm on a 5 win streak. It always does this in the middle of the game so I always lose a life and all my extras that I get from streaks. Can‚Äôt stand it.

reviews.title: Game consistently crashes on BRAND NEW iPhone 13 PRO MAX
reviews.name: Game consistently crashes on BRAND NEW iPhone 13 PRO MAX
reviews.text: It‚Äôs one thing for the game to consistently crash. Things happen. It‚Äôs another thing for A.) the game to crash on the latest highest end iPhone model.B.) For any boosters, lives or streaks used during the crash to be lost.It‚Äôs ridiculous that this keeps occurring, and at the very least I suggest you implement a feature (like many other apps) to recognize a crash and refund any boosters and reinstate any streaks lost from the crash.

reviews.title: Draws you in then goes pay to win
reviews.name: Draws you in then goes pay to win
reviews.text: I got this game when some of my friends had it just to pass the time and have a little fun while waiting in lines and whatnot.It was fun at first and was able to pass most levels without power-ups. Those I did have to use I had gained in-game without money just through playing. However, once I got to about level 161, the ‚Äúdifficulty‚Äù of the puzzles changed dramatically. What I mean is that they are actively put against you and unless you buy in-game currency or power-ups, you are essentially confined to rolling the dice over and over again until the setup is finally in a favorable-enough position to let you win after having tried on the same puzzle for 20 rounds.From my perspective, it‚Äôs clear the game wants to get you dependent on it by giving easier puzzles, and then makes them so impossibly difficult that you are essentially forced to fork out cash to make the game viable again.

reviews.title: Very frustrated
reviews.name: Very frustrated
reviews.text: I have been playing this game for a while, and enjoy it.  However, every time there is an update to the app, I lose all of my boosters.  This will be the 3rd time this has happened.  I will probably delete the app now.

reviews.title: Scam. Very disappointed.
reviews.name: Scam. Very disappointed.
reviews.text: There are some levels that are very hard to pass. It‚Äôs not possible unless you buy boosters. I got stuck on the level 1142 and paid my money to pass it! Still didn‚Äôt work. If I get to the point when I pay you my money means I want to get over with the level. Like buying a ticket. That‚Äôs quite unfair you still don‚Äôt let me pass it. Very disappointed and feeling like I‚Äôm being scammed. Deleting this game

reviews.title: Freeze

reviews.text: I really love playing this game BUT‚Ä¶.when I make a purchase for a certain package that pops up during the game, the screen freezes and you need to completely close the game and then reopen if you want to continue to play. You don‚Äôt get the package that you paid for. Not cool!

reviews.title: All about money
reviews.name: All about money
reviews.text: I‚Äôve been playing for almost 10 years. I‚Äôm on level 10701 and it‚Äôs obvious that this game is only about getting players to send money now. I‚Äôve noticed that the episodes are getting pretty ridiculous now. It‚Äôs like they only give you and average of 20 moves to beat any level whether it‚Äôs labeled hard or not. It‚Äôs pretty clear when you get on a level that even with the help of boosters you‚Äôll need more than 20 moves to beat it. Forcing players to spend money on more bars and boosters. I won‚Äôt continue playing. It was from n while it lasted
